TopicTitle: Escape from SkyPad 5: Kraken In LKO

Articles.Content:
http://glitchntwitch.tumblr.com/post/100729011066/were-almost-done-building-skypad-5-all-thats

Headcanon dialogs + screenshots, with a Kerbal-y sense of humor. Enjoy!

(Backstory: SkyPad 5 was the latest of my space stations. One of the part mod authors announced a major, craft-breaking update in the works, so an evacuation and de-orbiting was called for.)

(Also, I usually provide screenshots with my writing, so I hope it's OK that I only could select one prefix....)
